FrierenMod:SustainabilityPower.NAME: Perpetual
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn, shuffle #b2 #yMana in your discard pile.

FrierenMod:OutpouringPower.NAME: Outpouring
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yMana this turn, gain #b1 Strength.

FrierenMod:NightDressPower.NAME: Pajamas Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Exhaust ALL #yMana and deal damage equal to #b3 times the amount you Exhaust to ALL enemies. NL (Deal #b%d damage.).

FrierenMod:TrickPower.NAME: Trick
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if you don't have #yManaConcealment in your hand, add a #yManaConcealment into your hand.

FrierenMod:GainRelicPower.NAME: Spell for Finding Lost Accessories
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, get a random relic.

FrierenMod:PrepareRitePower.NAME: Preparation of Rites
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play #b3 #yMana, deal #b8 damage to All enemies.(Already play #b%d)

FrierenMod:SwitchStrengthAndDexterityPow.NAME: Switch
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, switch the amount of your #yStrength and #yDexterity.

FrierenMod:TimeTravelPower.NAME: Time Concept of Elf
DESCRIPTIONS: Send your everything #b%d turns into the future.

FrierenMod:ThunderPower.NAME: Destructive Lightning Magic
DESCRIPTIONS: Change #ySynchro change into #yUltimateSynchro in the rest of the combat.

FrierenMod:MagicReturnPower.NAME: Mana Return
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever it is attacked, shuffle #b%d #yMana into your discard pile.

FrierenMod:ChantWithoutMagicPower.NAME: Mana
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, #yChant can be activated without #yExhaust #yMana.
This turn, you CANNOT get new #yMana from cards.

FrierenMod:MagicInsteadOfCostPower.NAME: Imagination
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, your cards don't cost [E], cost the same amount of #yMana instead,.

FrierenMod:MagicianChokePower.NAME: Mage Style Choke
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #yMana this turn, loses #b%d HP
